name: The Smallest Hidathon - PC
description:
Join two teams of insects and other small creatures as they complete the last stage of The Smallest Hidathon in this hidden object game.  In case you're wondering it's a marathon where everyone hides - a hid-a-thon.

Learn more about the hidathon and the contests in the accompanying story segments and choose who should win, Team Insect Rights or Team Save our Environment as you discover the small creatures hidden behind the fairies, elves and gnomes.  The team with the least "found" members wins that round (i.e. the team that did the best job at hiding).  The team that wins the most rounds wins the overall race.

Each level has 2 contestants and some spectators.  Your task is to find a contestant without clicking the spectators.

Mix and match the settings as you prefer them:

  •   Timed / No Timer
  •   Click Limit / No Click Limit
  •   Casual / Expert (Expert mode has less time, less clicks allowed and the creatures to find are smaller.)

 Find 25 out of the 30 contestants to pass a level.

Get gold by finding 30 contestants without using a hint.

Replay any level as often as you like.

 There are 60 levels and the places that the creatures hide are randomly chosen.

 The objects to find are always behind the main picture but they are placed so that they will never be completely obscured - part of them will always be visible, but it might only be a small part.

Pressing the hint button will make one of the contestants (chosen at random) move to the front of the picture but you still have to find it.

Sounds and Music are turned off by default - turn them on if you enjoy those.

This game is also available for Android devices (coming soon).

System Requirements:  Will work on PC Windows XP or higher.

Please see my website for credits.
